p: So glad you liked Dads beautiful prayer. It was written for all his grandchildren substituting "boys" for "girls" and vice versa according to who is saying it!
It is sweet to hear Joanie and Elaine reciting it so seriously and with a wrapt look of awe on their faces!
Yes Ollie, the bed arrived in good condition.
I Know you are busy Enid but write as soon as you can do
